resources.string: Welcome to stay at our hotel!

The Jiachang wisdom hotel opened in 2020, and the decoration was completed in the same year. The hotel has 44 rooms. The hotel adopts self-service check-in, xiaochang intelligent customer control, high-end mousse mattress, customer experience led by a set of Shanghai self-service, intelligent customer control, butler service as one of the new upgrade products. \n The Jiachang wisdom hotel (Shanghai nanxiang hotel) is located at zhennan road, jiading district, Shanghai. Adjacent to the railway line 11 nanxiang station, nanxiang guyi garden. \n TEL：021-888-8888

string.b: Please go to the front desk and ask the hotel staff.

resources.string: If you want to know more about the functionality, please open "WeChat" and scan the qr code below. And enter "home wisdom hotel" small program. You can use your cell phone to control all kinds of appliances in the room.
The account number or password cannot be empty！

For Android：

 Method 1:
 1.Please Connect the AirScreen device and the Android phone to the same WiFi network.
 2.On your android device, download the Google Home app (On your sending device).
 3.Open the Google Home app, click on the left navigation icon to open the menu, and then choose to project the screen from the navigation bar list.
 4.Click projection screen and select your deviceAS_T95ZPLUS[Cast]
 Method 2:
 1.Please Connect the AirScreen device and the Android phone to the same WiFi network.
 2.In turn, click Display > Cast
 3.In the list of projection devices in the WLAN network, click on the target device AS_T95ZPLUS[Cast] to project the screen content.
 For Windows:

 1.Connect Windows devices and Andoid phones to the same (WiFi/Ethernet) network.
 2.Open the Chrome browser on your Windows device.
 3.Click the project button in Chrome and select your device AS_T95ZPLUS[Cast]
